newsitem.title: TURKEY: BASKETBALL-EFES OUTCLASS BAYER TO STAY TOP.
newsitem.headline: BASKETBALL-EFES OUTCLASS BAYER TO STAY TOP.

text.p: Efes Pilsen strengthened their lead in group H of the European basketball league on Wednesday with a comfortable 91-68 win over Bayer Leverkusen of Germany.
Unable to penetrate the Efes defence, the German side resorted to long-range shots which initially proved effective and gave them an early lead.
But it proved to be short lived as Efes fought back with similar three-pointers from Naumovski and by the interval had moved into a 42-36 lead.
Efes quickly went further ahead in the second half and in the last 10 minutes appeared to be playing more of an exhibition match against their outclassed opponents.
